title: Which is more important: creation or destruction? - Quora

response.answer_text: According to Kemetic philosophy, one cannot exist without the other. Life exists in the harmony between these two forces: Construction and Destruction. With only construction, no life can exist. With only destruction, no life can exist. It’s the constant flux of both that allows life. Both are literally equally important.
Why ask which is more important? Everything just is. creation is important for a birth of an Universe. Destruction is important for the death of an Universe.
response.upvotes: Answer requested by Hunter James Moffett
